name: Allah
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail: جو شخص نماز جمعہ سے قبل طہارت و صفائی اور سکون قلب کی ساتھ ۱۰۰ مرتبہ اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا۔ الله تعالی اسکے لئے تمام امور آسان فرما دے گا
edetail:
He who repeats this name 100 times with quietude and
purity of heart before the Ju'mma (Friday Noon) prayer,
will find all the things easy.

name: Ar-Rahman
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
ہر فرض نماز کے بعد اگر اس اسم کا ۱۰۰ مرتبہ ورد کیا جائے تو اسکی
برکت سے نہ صرف یاداشت اور ذہانت میں اضافہ ہوتا ہے بلکہ خشوع
قلب بھی حاصل ہوتا ہے۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 100 times after each farz
prayer will have good memory, a keen awareness, and
be free of a heavy heart.

name: Ar-Rahim
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
ہر فرض نماز کے بعد اگر اس اسم کا ۱۰۰ مرتبہ ورد کیا جائے تو اسکی
برکت سے یاداشت اور ذہانت میں اضافہ ہوتا ہے۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 100 times after each farz
prayer will have good memory.

name: Al-Malik
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو کوئی اس اسم کو روزانہ بعد از زوال نماز ظہر سے قبل پڑھے گا، تو
الله تعالی أسے بکثرت مال و دولت سے نوازے گا۔
edetail:
If you recite this name of Allah abundantly every day
after Zawaal ( the time of mid-day immediately before
Duhr prayer), Allah will give him abundant wealth.
Insha-Allah.

name: Al-Quddus
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
دن میں ۱۰۰ بار اس اسم کا ورد کرنے والوں کا دل ہر قسم کی
پریشانیوں سے آزاد رہتا ہے۔
edetail:
The hearts of those who repeat this Name 100 times
each day will be free from anxiety.

name: As-Salam
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر اس اسم کو 160 بار ورد کر کے مریض پر دم کیا جائے تو مریض
صحت یاب ہو جاتا ہے۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 160 times to a sick person,
help them regain health.

name: Al-Mumin
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کوئی اس اسم کا ورد کسی قسم کے بھی خوف کے عالم میں
630 مرتبہ کیا جائے، تو الله تعالی أسے ہر طرح کی آفات و بلیات سے
محفوظ رکھے گا۔
edetail:
If you recite this name 630 times in times of fear, Allah
will protect you from all calamities.

name: Al-Muhaymin
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو بھی ۲ رکعت نماز پڑھنے کے بعد اس اسم کا ورد ۱۰۰ مرتبہ مکمل
ایمانداری اور توجہ سے کرتے ہیں، الله تعالى أن کا ظاہر و باطن روشن
کر دیتا ہے۔
edetail:
Those who repeat this Name 100 times after offering 2
rakaat Salaah with sincerity, Allah purify them physically
and spirtually.

name: Al-Aziz
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر ہر فجر کی نماز کے بعد 40 بار اس اسم کا ورد کیا جائے تو اس کی
برکت سے ورد کرنے والا نہ صرف خود کفیل ہو جائے گا بلکہ دوسروں
کی امداد سے بے نیاز ہو جائے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 40 times after each Fajr
prayer for 40 days will be independent of need from
others.

name: Al-Jabbar
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو بھی اس اسم کا ورد روزانہ 226 مرتبہ کرے گا تو کوئی شخص
بھی اسکی مرضی کے خلاف اس سے کوئی بھی عمل نہیں کروا سکتا
اور نہ وہ مغلوب الغضب ہو کر اس سے درشت رویہ اختیار کر سکتا ہے۔
edetail:
He who repeats this name 226 times daily will not be
compelled to do anything against his wishes, and ill
not be exposes to violence, severity, or hardness.

name: Al-Mutakabbir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name before having intercourse
with his wife, Allah will bless him with the righteous
child.

name: Al-Khaliq
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this name at night, Allah will create an
angel whose duty is to act righteously for this person
until the day of judgement. The reward of this angel's
actions will be given to that person.

name: Al-Bari
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 100 times for continuous
7 days after Maghrib prayer, Allah will give him male
children. InshaAllah!

name: Al-Musawwir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
If a women who desires to give birth, but cannot, fasts
7 days, and each day at the breaking of the fast (ifta'r)
she repeats Ya Baari"' Ul Musawwiru 21 times, breathes
into a glass of water, and then breaks the fast with his
water, Allah will bless her with a child.

name: Al-Ghaffar
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this name 100 times after Jumma
Prayer, will soon begin Allah's forgiveness.

name: Al-Qahhar
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name continually, Allah will free
him from the love of this world and, instead, Allah's love
will become inborn in his heart. Insha-Allah.

name: Al-Wahhab
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
The person who repeats this Name 7 times after (dua)
appealing to Allah, his appeal will be answered. He who
has a desire or a person who is captured by an enemy or
someone who cannot earn enough to maintain himself,
if he repeats this Name for 3 or 7 nights 100 times after
2 nafals at mid-night with ablution, Allah will bless him
with all his needs.

name: Ar-Razzaq
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name will be provided with
sustenance by Allah.

name: Al-Fattah
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
The heart of him who repeats this Name 70 times after
Fajar Prayer will be open, and he will be given victory

name: Al-Alim
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this name, his heard will become
luminous, revelling divine light (Nur).

name: Al-Qabid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who writes this Name on 50 pieces of food (fruit,
bread, etc.) for 40 days will be free from hunger.

name: Al-Basit
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 10 times during Fajr with
open hands (palms up), then rubs his face with his
hands, will be free of needs from others.

name: Al-Khafid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
Those who fast three days, and on the forth day in the
gathering read this name 70000 times, Allah will free
them from harm by their enemy.

name: Ar-Rafi
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 100times a day and night,
Allah will make him higher as far as honor, richness and
merit are concerned.

name: Al-Muizz
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
Repeat 140 times after Isha prayer duing Monday and
Friday nights (according to lunar calendar, Sunday and
Thursday), Allah makes him dignified in the eyes of
others. That person will have fear of no one but Allah

name: Al-Mudhill
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 75 times will be free frin
garn by those who are jealous of him and wish to harm
him. Allah will protect him.

name: As-Sami
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 100 times withoug speaking
to anyone on Thursday after the Duhr prayer (noon time),
Allah will bestow on him any desire.

name: Al-Basir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 100 times between Fard
and the first Sunnah prayer at Jumma (Friday afternoon
prayer), Allah will give this person esteem in the eyes of
hers.

name: Al-Hakam
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times at night, many
secrets (sirr) will be revealed to him.

name: Al-Adl
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
On Friday night, if you write this name on a piece of
bread, people will obey you.

name: Al-Latif
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who has become poor, and is lonely, if he repeats
this Name 100 times after Fard prayer, say 2 Nafals, his
earlier desired will be fulfilled.

name: Al-Khabir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who has a bad habit which he doesn't Iike, and
continuously repeats this Name, will be quickly freed
from this habit.

name: Al-Halim
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
If one writes this Name on a piece of paper, and puts it
where his seed is shown, on harm disaster of calamity
will befall his crop.

name: Al-Azim
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times will be
respected.

name: Al-Ghafur
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times, Allah will
provide his needs, and as a result he will not need
others, but they will need them.

name: Ash-Shakur
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who has a heavy heart, and repeats this name 41
times, breathes into a glass of water, then washed his
face with water, his heard will lighten and will be able to
maint in himseli

name: Al-Ali
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He whose faith is low and repeats this Name, will be
raised, his density will be opened; the traveller will reach
his homeland.

name: Al-Kabir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 100 times each day will have
esteem.

name: Al-Hafiz
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 16 times dailyt will be
protected against calamities.

name: Al-Muqit
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
If someone with the bad-mannered child repeats this
Name into the glass of water, and gives this water to the
child to drink, the child will have good manners.

name: Ar-Hasib
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
If one is afraid of being robbed, afraid of jealously of
another, of being harmed or wronged, he begins on a
Thursday to repeat this Name 70 times a day and night,
fo days and nights. After the 71st time, he says Allah
is Reckoner (Hasbiyallah-ul-Haseeb), and he will be free
from his fears.

name: Al-Jalil
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who writes this Name on a piece of paper with musk
and saffron, washes it, and drinks the water froma
ceramic container made of earth, will be revered among
men.

name: Al-Karim
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times will have esteem
in this world and the hereafter.

name: Ar-Raqib
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 7 times on himself and
family and property, will be under Allah's protection.

name: Al-Mujib
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
The appeal of him who repeats this Name will be
answered.

name: Al-Wasi
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who has a difficulty earning, repeats this Name, he
will have good earnings.

name: Al-Hakim
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
Any lean meats 200g,
1 cucumber or tomato.
edetail:
He who repeats this Name continuously (from time to
time) will not have difficulty in his work.

name: Al-Wadud
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر دو افراد کے درمیان تنازعہ ہو اور ان میں سے کوئی ایک شخص اس
اسم کا ۱۰۰۰ بار ورد کر کے اس کے کھانے پر دم کرے اور دوسرے شخص
کو کھلا دے تو ان کی آپس کی رنجش ختم ہو جائے گی۔
edetail:
If there is a quarrel between two people, and one of
them repeats this Name 1000 times over some food
and has the other person eat the food, there will be no
iisagreement between them.

name: Al-Majid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail: جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا وہ دنیا میں باعزت رہے گا۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name will gain glory.

name: Al-Baith
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا اس کے دل میں الله کا خوف پیدا
ہو جائے گا۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name gains the fear of Allah.

name: Ash-Shahid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کسی کی اولاد نافرمان ہو اور وہ اس اسم کا ورد کرے تو اس کی
اولاد فرمانبردار ہو جائے گی۔
edetail:
He who has a rebellious hild and repeats this Name too
the Child, the child will be obedient.

name: Al-Haq
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کسی کی کوئی چیز گم ہو جائے اور وہ شخص اس اسم کا ورد
کرے تو اسکی گمشدہ چیز مل جائے گی۔
edetail:
If one has lost something and repeats this Name, he will
find what he lost.

name: Al-Wakil
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کسی شخص کو پانی میں ڈوبنے، یا آگ میں جلنے یا اسی قسم کے
کسی بھی خطرات کا سامنا ہو تو اسکو چاہئیے کی اس اسم کا بکثرت
ورد کرے، انشا الله وہ تمام خطرات سے محفوظ رہے گا اور الله تعالى
خود حفاظت کرے گا۔
edetail:
He who is afraid of drowning, being burnt in a fire, or
any similar danger, and repeats this Name continuously
(from time to time) will be under the protection of Allah.

name: Al-Qawee
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کوئی شخص اپنے دشمن کو شکست نہ دے سکے تو اس کو چاہیئے
کہ وہ اس ارادے کے ساتھ کہ دشمن اس کو کوئی نقصان نہیں پہنچا
سکے، اس اسم کا ورد کرے تو انشا الله وہ دشمن کے غلبہ سے محفوظ
رہے گا۔
edetail:
He who can't defeat his enemy, and repeats this Name
with the intention of not being harmed, will be free from
his enemy's harm.

name: Al-Matin
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کوئی شخص کسی مشکل میں پھنس جائے تو اس کو چاہیئے کہ وہ
اس اسم کا ورد کرے تو انشا الله اسے اس مشکل سے نجات حاصل ہو
edetail:
If one has troubles and repeates this Name, his troubles
will disappear

name: Al-Walee
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کر کے اپنے مکان پر دم کرے انشاء الله اسكا |
مکان ہر قسم کے خطرات سے محفوظ رہے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name and breathes into his house,
his house will be free from danger.

name: Al-Hamid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کوئی شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے تو دنیا اس سے محبت کرے گی۔
اور اس کی تعظیم کرے گی۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name will be loved and praised.

name: Al-Muhsi
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
وہ شخص جو پرسش روز حساب سے خائف ہو اگر وہ اس اسم کا ۱۰۰۰ |
بار ورد کرے گا تو اس کے لئے روز حساب کی منزل آسان ہو جائے گی۔
edetail:
He who is afraid of being questioned on the judgement
day and repeats this Name 1000 times will have
easinessS.

name: Al-Mubdi
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر اس اسم کا ورد کر کے کسی ایسی حاملہ پر دم کر دیا جائے جس
کو سقوط حمل کا اندیشہ ہو تو وہ انشاء الله اسقاط حمل کے خطرے
سے محفوظ ہو جائے گی۔
edetail:
If this Name is repeated on a pregnant woman who is
afraid of abortion, she will be free from danger.

name: Al-Mueed
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر خاندان کا کوئی فرد گم ہو جائے تو اس اسم کا 70 بار ورد کرنے
سے گمشده شخص باعافیت گھر آجائے گا۔
edetail:
If this Name is repeated 70 times for someone who is
away from his family, thar person will return safely.

name: Al-Muhyee
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کوئی شخص بہت پریشان حال ہو اسے چاہیئے کی دن میں 7 بار
اس اسم کا ورد کرے تو الله تعالی اس کو ہر بوجھ اور پریشانی سے
سبکدوش کرے گا۔
edetail:
If a person has a heavy burden and repeats this Name 7
times daily, his burden will be taken away.

name: Al-mumeet
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر اس اسم کا ورد کیا جائے تو اسکا ورد دشمن کی تباہی کا باعث
ہوگا۔
edetail: This Name is repeated to destroy one's enemy.

name: Al-Hayy
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail: جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے تو اس کو عمر دراز عطا ہوگی۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name will have long life.

name: Al-Qayyum
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا تو انشاء الله وہ کبھی غفلت اور بے
خبری کا شکار نہیں ہوگا۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name will not fall into inadvertency.

name: Al-Wajid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail: اس اسم کا ورد کرنے والا دین و دنیا کی دولت سے مالامال ہو جاتا ہے۔
edetail:
Those who repeat this Name many times, will be
respected.

name: Al-Majid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail: اس اسم کا ورد کرنے والے کا دل تجلیات سے منور ہو جاتا ہے۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name, his heart will be enlightened.

name: Al-Wahid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص پر سکون ماحول میں اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا، انشاء الله
تعالی وہ خوف اور دنیا کے ہر فریب سے آزاد ہو جائے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name alone and in quiet place will
be free from fear and delusion.

name: Al-Ahad
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ۱۰۰۰ بار ورد کرے گا، اس پر کائنات کے اسرار
کھل جائیں گے۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 1000 times, will have certain
secrets open to him

name: Al-Samad
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کئی بار ورد کرے گا، تو الله اس کی حاجت
روائی کرے گا جسکے نتیجے میں اس کو دوسروں کی ضرورت نہیں
رہے گی بلکہ دوسروں کو اس کی ضرورت ہو گی۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times, Allah will
provide his needs, and as a result he will not need
others, but they will need them.

name: Al-Qadir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا، تو الله اس کی حاجت روائی کرے
گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name, all his desired will be
fulfilled.

name: Al-Muqtadir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا، تو وہ اصل حقائق سے باخبر ہو
جائے گا۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name will be aware of the truth.

name: Al-Muqaddim
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص جنگ کے دوران اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا الله اسکو پیش
قدمی عطا کرے گا، اور جو شخص کسی خوفناک مقام پر جہاں وہ تنہا |
بھی ہو اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا تو انشاء الله ہر ضرر سے محفوظ رہے
گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name on the bettlefield, or who has
fear of being alone in an awe -inspiring place, no harm
will come to him.

name: Al-Muakhkhir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا دن میں ۱۰۰ بار ورد کرے گا تو اس کے دل میں
الله کے سوا دوسری ہر چیز کی محبت ختم ہو جائے گی۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name in his heart 100 times each
day, only Allah will remain. No other love can enter.

name: Al-Awwal
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کسی کے یہاں لڑکا نہ ہوتا ہو یا کوئی شخص کسی ہمسفر سے
قربت حاصل کرنا چاہتا ہو تو 40 جمعوں تک اس اسم کا 1000 بار
ورد کرے گا تو انشاء الله اس کے دل کی مراد پوری ہو جائے گی۔
edetail:
He who likes to have a child, or would like to come
together with person who is travelling, repeats this
Name 1000 times for 40 Fridays.

name: Al-Akhir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا وہ نہ صرف خوشحالی
کی زندگی بسر کرے گا بلکہ اس کا خاتمہ بھی بخیر ہوگا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times will lead a good
life and at the end of the life will have a good death.

name: Az-Zahir
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص جمعے کی نماز کے بعد 15 بار اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا تو
الله اس کے قلب کو منور فرمائے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 15 times after Friday
Jumma) prayer, divine light (Nur) will enter his heart

name: Al-Batin
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص دن میں 3 بار اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا اس میں حقیقت
اشیاء دیکھنے کی اہلیت پیدا ہو جائے گی۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 3 times daily will be able to
see the truth in things

name: Al-Wali
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کوئی شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا تو الله تعالی کی دوستی کا
شرف اس کو حاصل ہو جائے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name is likely to walliullah, the
friend of Allah.

name: Al-Mutaali
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کوئی شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا تو الله تعالی کی
خوشنودی اس کو حاصل ہو جائے گی۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times will gain the
benecolence of Allah.

name: Al-Barr
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کر کے اپنے بچے پر دم کرے گا، اس کا بچہ
بد بختیوں سے محفوظ رہے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name to his child, this child will be
free from misfortune

name: At-Tawwab
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا تو اس کی دعا قبول ہو
جائے گی۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times, his repentance
will be accepted.

name: Al-Muntaqim
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا اس کو اپنے دشمنوں کے
مقابلے میں کامیابی حاصل ہوگی۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times, will be
victoriouSs against his enemies.

name: Al-Afuww
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا اس کے تمام گناہ معاف
کر دیے جائیں گے۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name many times, all his sins will
be forgiven.

name: Ar-Rauf
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا تو الله أس پر اپنی
برکتیں نازل کرے گا۔
edetail: He who repeats this name many times will be blessed by Allah.

name: Malik-Al-Mulk
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا تو وہ دوسروں کی
نظروں میں معزز و قابل احترام ہو جائے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name will have esteem among
people.

name: Zul-l-Jalal wal-Ikram
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
meng: The Lord of Majesty and Generosity
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا تو وہ انشاء الله غنی ہو
جائے گا۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name many times will be rich.

name: Al-Muqsit
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا تو وہ شیاطین کی ایذا
رسانیوں سے محفوظ رہے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name will be free from the hard of
the devil

name: Aj-Jami
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا تو وہ اس شے کو پا لے گا
جو اس نے کھو دی ہوگی۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name will find the things that he
lost.

name: Al-Ghanee
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا کثرت سے ورد کرے گا تو وہ آسودہ حال ہو
جائے گا اور حرص و ہوس سے آزاد ہو جائے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name will be contented and not
COvetous

name: Al-Mughnee
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
دس جمعے تک اگر کوئی شخص دن میں ۱۰ بار اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا
تو پروردگار عالم اس کو خود کفیل بنا دے گا۔
edetail: He who repeats this name 10 times for 10 Fridays will become self-sufficient.

name: Al-Mani
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد بکثرت کرے گا اسکی گھریلو زندگی
خوشگوار گزرے گی
edetail:
Those who repeat this Name will have a good family
life.

name: ad-Darr
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
اگر کوئی کم رتبہ شخص جمعہ کی رات میں اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا ۔
تو انشاء الله اس کا رتبہ بلند ہو جائے گا۔
edetail:
Those who are in low class, if they repeat this Name on
Friday nights, their status will be raised.

name: An-Nafi
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد اپنی مقدار کے مطابق 4 دن تک کرے گا تو
وہ ہر قسم کے نقصانات سے محفوظ رہے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name for 4 days as many times as
he can, no harm will come to him.

name: An-Nur
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail: جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا اس کا باطن روشن ہو جائے گا۔
edetail: Those who repeat this NAme wil have inner light.

name: Al-Hadi
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail: جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا اس کو روحانی علم نصیب ہوگا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name will have spiritual
knowledge.

name: Al-Badi
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص اس اسم کو بطریقہ ذیل 70 بار ورد کرے گا، انشاء الله
اسکی تمام مشکلات دور ہو جائیں گی
edetail:
He who repeats Ya Badie-us-samawat-wal-ard, 70 times
daily, all his troubles will disappear.

name: Al-Baqi
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص سورج طلوع ہونے سے پہلے اس اسم کا ۱۰۰ مرتبہ ورد کرے
گا اس کی تمام پریشانیاں دور ہو جائیں گی اور زندگی امن و سکون کے
ساتھ گزرے گی نیز الله تعالی کا فضل و کرم اس کے شامل حال رہے گا۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 100 times before sunrise will
be free from all disasters throughout his life, and will be
shown mercy in the hereafter.

name: Al-Warith
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail: جو شخص اس اسم کا ورد کرے گا، وہ عمر طویل پائے گا۔
edetail: He who repeats this Name will have long life

name: Ar-Rashid
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
meng: The Guide to the right path
udetail:
جو شخص مغرب اور عشاء کی نمازوں کے درمیان اس اسم کا ۱۰۰۰ بار

ورد کرے گا انشاء الله اس کی تمام مشکلات دور ہو جائیں گی۔
edetail:
He who repeats this Name 1000 times between early
evening prayer (Maghrib) and night prayer (Isha), his
troubles will be cleared up.

name: As-Sabur
audio:
1-2 boiled eggs,
1/2 grapefruits or oranges, 
Tea or coffee without sugar and milk,
udetail:
جو شخص کسی مشکل میں گرفتار ہو یا غم زدہ ہو تو اس کو چاہیے
کہ وہ اس اسم کا ۳۰۰۰ بار ورد کرے تو انشاء الله تعالی مشکلات اور غم

سے نجات پائے گا۔
edetail: He who is in trouble,difficulty or sorrow and repeats this name 3000 times, will be resued from his difficulty.
